summary: Provides a set of command‑line utilities for creating, packaging, extracting and managing Kedro micro‑packages. It handles generation of package metadata (manifest, pyproject), resolves and normalises requirements, moves and renames source modules, builds source distributions, and validates package structure.
business_intent: Enable developers to modularise Kedro pipelines into independent, versioned Python packages that can be distributed and reused across projects, simplifying dependency management and code sharing.
